summary: A test module that validates the TextToVideoSDPipeline's core functionality, performance characteristics, and compatibility with optimized attention mechanisms, covering aspects such as attention slicing, output consistency, batch inference, image count handling, default generation behavior, and deterministic execution on GPU.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and quality of the text‑to‑video generation pipeline for production use, enabling early detection of regressions and ensuring consistent behavior across hardware configurations and optimization settings.
